RADIO STATION KUSD
UNIVERSITY OF SOUTH DAKOTA
690 KILOCYCLES
lOOO WATTS
SOUTH DAKOTA
VERMILLION
January 23, 1956
TO ; John Holt
John Regnell
Waldo Abbot
Hugh Mix
FROM ; Jim Slack
SUBJECT ; Curtain Going Up
This is an affirmative vote for the continuation
of Professor Buell’s charming program “Curtain
Going Up". If Professor Buell plans to omit
all time references, I see no reason why he should
not record 8 programs this summer for use by the
network beginning in October. I think John is
right when he suggests that we could leave it up
to each station to either start the first one in
September or the fifth in October. John, you
say these commentaries are 30 minutes each -- I
was sure they were only 15?
